scripts.text:
ALTER TABLE [dim].[students_data]
ADD 
    TotalMarks INT,
    AverageMarks DECIMAL(5, 2),
    Grade Varchar(5);

typeProperties.value:
SELECT 
    -- Query 1: Basic Employee Details
    e.employee_id AS employee_id,
    e.name AS employee_name,
    ISNULL(m.name, 'No Manager') AS manager_name,

value.value:
SUM(e.salary) AS department_total_salary,
    AVG(e.salary) AS department_average_salary,

(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Employee r WHERE r.manager_id = e.employee_id) AS direct_reports_count

FROM 
    Employee e
LEFT JOIN 
    Employee m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id
LEFT JOIN 
    (
        SELECT 
            department,
            COUNT(*) AS department_employee_count
        FROM 
            Employee
        GROUP BY 
            department
    ) d ON e.department = d.department

GROUP BY 
    e.employee_id, e.name, m.name, d.department, e.salary

ORDER BY 
    e.employee_id;

support.text: To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!

scriptLines: join1 derive(EmailAddress = substring(EmailAddress, 1, 3) + 'XXX@' + substring(EmailAddress, 5, length(EmailAddress) - 4)) ~> Maskemail
accounts as (accountBalance as integer, accountId as long, created as date)[],

dealership as (inventory as (id as short, make as string, model as string, price as short, specs as (engine as string, features as string[], transmission as string), year as short)[], location as string, name as string)

sources.name: DelimitedText14

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DelimitedText14

sources.name: AzureSqlTable1

	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable1
